hu.kazocsaba.math.matrix.util

Class MatrixPrinter.Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.kazocsaba.math.matrix.util.MatrixPrinter.Control
  • Enclosing class:
    MatrixPrinter

    public static class MatrixPrinter.Control
extends Object
    MatrixPrinter.Control encapsulates data used for printing matrices. These data are the following:
    writer The destination to receive the result; defaults to the standard output (new BufferedWriter(new OutputStreamWriter(System.out))).
    linePrefix, lineSuffix String values that are written at the beginning and at the end of each line. Both default to the empty string.
    columnSeparator The string that separates columns of the matrix; it is printed in every line after each matrix element but the last one. It defaults to two space characters.
    columnWidthsEqual If this flag is true, all columns are forced to have the same width, padding with space if necessary. The default value is true.
    alignment The horizontal alignment of the matrix elements within the columns. The default value is HorizontalAlignment.CENTER_RIGHT. (Note that the layout algorithm assumes fixed character width.)

    • Method Detail

      • setLinePrefix

        public void setLinePrefix(String linePrefix)
        Sets the line prefix string that is printed at the beginning of each line. If linePrefix is null, the default empty string is be set.
        Parameters:
        linePrefix - the line prefix string

      • setLineSuffix

        public void setLineSuffix(String lineSuffix)
        Sets the line suffix string that is printed at the end of each line. If lineSuffix is null, the default empty string is be set.
        Parameters:
        lineSuffix - the line suffix string

      • setColumnSeparator

        public void setColumnSeparator(String columnSeparator)
        Sets the column separator. As removing the space between columns is generally undesired, the null value is not permitted; the empty string must be passed to this function explicitly to achieve this result.
        Parameters:
        columnSeparator - the column separator
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the argument is null

      • setColumnWidthsEqual

        public void setColumnWidthsEqual(boolean columnWidthsEqual)
        Sets whether or not the columns of the matrix should have the same width.
        Parameters:
        columnWidthsEqual - true if columns should have the same width, false otherwise

      • setAlignment

        public void setAlignment(MatrixPrinter.HorizontalAlignment alignment)
        Sets the horizontal alignment of the matrix elements within their columns.
        Parameters:
        alignment - the horizontal alignment of the elements
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the argument is null
